{"id":1784767677,"question_id":4039,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1759026819,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1784767677/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Compute Decimal Representation","memory":"9.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> decimalRepresentation(int n) {\n        vector<int> ans;\n        for (int i=0; n > 0; i++) {\n            if (n % 10)\n                ans.push_back(pow(10, i) * (n % 10));\n            n /= 10;\n        }\n        reverse(ans.begin(), ans.end());\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"compute-decimal-representation","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1218}
